channel.title: Help me with client run
channel.description:
hi, i want to run my client. but it says this when i run :S
[code]java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.openSocket(Client.java:2159) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.openJagGrabInputStream(Client.java:13007) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.connect(Client.java:1170) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.startUp(Client.java:9972) at com.ad.nauseam.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:99) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.run(Client.java:7383) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Help me with client run
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“frozenearth, post:1, topic:537597”]hi, i want to run my client. but it says this when i run :S

java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.openSocket(Client.java:2159) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.openJagGrabInputStream(Client.java:13007) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.connect(Client.java:1170) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.startUp(Client.java:9972) at com.ad.nauseam.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:99) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.run(Client.java:7383) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/quote]
Hm, I’m not sure, But this could be an anti-leech which refuses connecting to the ip you’ve set in the client class. But i’m not sure.
